sen.j: この地の古名である「呉服（くれは）の里」に因み、呉春を名乗るようになる（この縁で、池田市には、今でも「呉春」と言う名の地酒がある）。
sen.e: He started to call himself Goshun (呉春) after the old name of the place where he was staying, 'Kureha no Sato' (呉服の里).

sen.j: この頃から、師匠の蕪村とは対照的な画風である円山応挙に接近、文人画の味わいを残しつつ、写実的な作風へと転進し、画境を開く。
sen.e: From about this time, he began to have a esteem to Okyo Maruyama, whose picture had a contrasting style to that of his master Buson, and he broke new ground in painting, by changing his style to more realistic one while conserving a taste of literati painting.
